channel.title: Custom Shop Currency?
channel.description:
I'm somewhat new to java and I'm trying to figure out how to make a shop that only accepts a currency other than 995. Such as a shop like castle wars or fist of guthix. Add me on skype or MSN if you can help. Or post here.
Skype: tztokbruce MSN: mmolividfarmer@hotmail.com

item.title: Custom Shop Currency?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You need to have your own specialItemValue for custom currency in your playersAssistant class.

if (c.myShopId == ####) { //shop id c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " custom currency."); return; }

This as well

if (c.myShopId == SHOPID) { //The shops ID if (c.CUSTOMCURRENCY >= getSpecialItemValue(####)) {//The item id for the shops value if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.CUSTOMCURRENCY -= getSpecialItemValue(####);// c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough CURRENCYHERE to buy this item."); } } }

Put those in ShopHandler, and configure them :).

Read full topic
